messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virus Accidently Sent in "Homeschooler Needs Our Hel...
messages.msgSnippet: When you send warnings about a virus, it is a good idea not to include the original message with the virus in it. Otherwise the warnings are helping to spread
messages.messageBody:
When you send warnings about a virus, it is a good idea not to include the
original message with the virus in it. Otherwise the warnings are helping to
spread the virus.

On almost all of the messages on this topic, I get the same warning from
Norton Antivirus about an unsafe active x control embedded in the message.

Billy Greer
fun@...
http://www.FUN-Books.com
Family Unschoolers Network
http://www.unschooling.org

messages.msgSnippet: I did a virus check and didn t find anything. Happy Mothering, Julie Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam Please check out a few of my  favorite
messages.messageBody:
I did a virus check and didn't find anything.

Happy Mothering,
Julie
Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
http://www.mothering.com
http://www.AttachmentParent.org
http://www.LaLecheLeague.org

"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
being kind is more important than being right."
-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.
